greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (-1)^pi(n) where pi(n) is the number of primes <= n.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (First 1000 terms from Harry J. Smith)
program: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, if (n, a=(-1)^primepi(n), a=1); write("b065357.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Sep 30 2009
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Oct 31 2001
